interface.name: LibXslt
interface.summary: LibXslt: library and tools for applying XSLT to XML-documents
interface.description: LibXslt is a library and tools for applying XSLT (Extensible Styleheets Transformations) to XML-documents. XML (Extensible Markup Language) is the universal format for data on the Web. XML is a metalanguage to design markup languages, i.e. text language where semantic and structure are added to the content using extra "markup" information enclosed between angle bracket. HTML is the most well-known markup language.

implementation.license: GPL v2 (GNU General Public License), LGPL (GNU Lesser General Public License)

entry-point.name: xsltproc
entry-point.description: xsltproc is a command line tool for applying XSLT stylesheets to XML documents. It is part of libxslt, the XSLT C library for GNOME. While it was developed as part of the GNOME project, it can operate independently of the GNOME desktop.
